comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Antwerp ([ˈæntwɜrp]; Dutch: Antwerpen, French: Anvers) is a city and municipality in Belgium and the capital of the Antwerp province in Flanders, one of Belgium's three regions. Photochrom from the LOC P&P Collection: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3887202788/]

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: trialsanderrors: Nice connection between this photograph and one of our photochrom images of Antwerp. We will add to this very brief caption. The Cathedral of Our Lady (Dutch: Onze-Lieve-Vrouwekathedraal) is quite a striking part of the city skyline in Antwerp. Here is another image of the cathedral from the Photochrom Collection here at the Library. Thanks again!
